import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import '../css/Post.css'; import UserContext from '../utils/UserContext'; const Post = ({post}) => { const { currentUser } = useContext(UserContext) return (
{post.postedBy}
{post.datePosted}
{post.text}
{post.postedBy === currentUser.username ?
:
}
) } export default Post
